data.name: asamodule_specific_properties
data.marketing: Shows specific properties in an ASAModule widget/module. Useful for generating visits to properties that might otherwise not be seen.
data.description: Widget. Shows specific properties in an ASAModule widget/module. Use the arguments 'asamodule_sp_uids=x,y,z' to specify the property uids to be shown. Use asamodule_sp_vertical=1 if the module would be used with a vertical layout.
data.author: Vince Wooll
